title: MAR10 Day 2024 News and Updates
description: To celebrate Mario Day, please take a look at this video for the latest news about Mario. We learn more about the new upcoming Mario Animated film coming out April 3, 2026. Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door coming out May 23rd. Luigi's Mansion 2 HD coming out June 27th and Dr. Mario, Mario Golf, and Mario Tennis (GB/GBA) version coming out on the Switch on March 12th.

title: Drill Team Alumni Reacts to (and Performs) Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's Junon Parade
description: On this episode of Expert Reacts we bring in former GameSpot senior editor Michael Higham. Not only has he reviewed Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth for IGN, but he is also a high school ROTC drill team alumni. Today, he's joining us to break down and recreate Final Fantasy 7’s Junon parade drills.

title: Nintendo And Illumination Are Making Another Mario Movie
description:
In news that should surprise absolutely no one, Nintendo and Illumination announced today--on Mario Day--that the two companies are working together on another Mario movie. 2023's The Super Mario Bros. Movie earned more than $1.3 billion and finished the year as the No. 2 highest-grossing movie globally (only behind Barbie), so it was likely always only a matter of time before another Mario movie would be announced.

The new film is another animated film that is "based on the world of Super Mario Bros." but whether or not it's The Super Mario Bros. Movie 2 or something else remains to be seen. Previously, we heard rumors of a Donkey Kong movie with Seth Rogen, for example.

Whatever it is, the new film will come to thea
